meanings.definition: In a drunken or intoxicated manner.
meanings.sent1: He stumbled sottedly out of the bar, unable to walk straight.
meanings.sent2: After a few too many drinks, he spoke sottedly and slurred his words.
meanings.sent3: The cat wobbled sottedly after accidentally drinking spilled wine.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled sottedly in the night sky, as if tipsy from their own light.
meanings.sent5: The old man's eyes gleamed sottedly as he reminisced about his wild youth.
